resources.string: Start typing to filter the list...

StudentVoice enables prospective and current University students to locate Uni’s, local attractions and view public reviews about a Univeristy.


Created during CDI Europe’s Apps For Good course, this version of the App represents what we were able to achieve with only 3 hours a day for 4 weeks, never having created an App before. Watch this space for the next version.


- Moses Sonson, Carlos Mateus, Matthew Tanti -


talktous@studentvoiceonline.co.uk
